column4: how many drivers can a car have? what happens if a car has 2 or more drivers? :)
windows installer also does not let you run multiple version of the installer, it just depends on what the installer is doing to be liberal enough
I can install skype and photoshop cs3 at the same time?
well, technically you shouldnt do that, and with some new versions of the installer, you cannot do that -- like installing m$ office and wmp at the same time, wont happen
